sub_title: SSA Arabic and English Translator and Interpreter at Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons (OPCW)
summary: Experienced freelance translator and interpreter with a demonstrated history of working in the non-profit organization management industry. Skilled in Translation, Interpretation, Arabic, English, Editing and Language Services. Strong media and communication professional with a BA in translation, Diploma in Interpretation from the Holy Spirit University of Kaslik, USEK.
